api/Saro.Core.html.keywords: Namespace Saro.Core Classes AssetLoaderFactory DefaultAssetLoader 不可重复资源加载器 精细管理所有资源引用，保证 此加载器 每个资源只被加载一次。持有此加载器的对象生命周期结束时，调用释放接口 UnloadAllAssetRef() 一般在 `自动卸载AB` 的情况下使用 FSM<T> FsmSnapshot<T> FsmStateBehaviour<T> FsmStateData<T> IAssetHandleAsyncExtension IAssetInterfaceExtension LruAssetLoader lru资源加载器。这个是xasst给的案例，个人感觉欠考虑 达到上限后，自动卸载最久不用的资源(真正释放资源是在切换scene时)，并加载新资源 只能在 `不自动卸载AB` 的情况下使用，否则会出现已用的资源被卸载掉的情况 RC Structs IAssetHandleAsyncExtension.IAssetHandleAwaiter Interfaces IAssetHandle IAssetLoader 用于处理各个子对象的资源加载，各个Manager可以根据需求实现不同的类 提供一个默认实现 DefaultAssetLoader IAssetManager IRefCount

Saved prefab will have no missing scripts left. Will not mod prefabs that dont have missing scripts. NOTE : If prefab has another prefab#2 that is not in PATH, that prefab#2 will still have missing scripts. The instance of the prefab#2 in prefab will not have missing scripts (thus counted has override of prefab#2) HOW TO USE : Copy code in script anywhere in project. Set the PATH var in method RemoveMissingScripstsInPrefabsAtPath() . Clik the button. Declaration public static void RemoveMissingScriptsSelected()
